1.label: Construction Halted
1.desc: On a table in the shed.

2.label: Vermin Infestation
2.desc: On a workbench in a back room of the garage.

3.label: Führer's Plans
3.desc: On a table in the kitchen.

4.label: Perimeter Problems
4.desc: On a desk in the shed.

1.label: Missing Inventory
1.desc: On a wooden crate between the tents.

2.label: Guest of the Führer
2.desc: On a desk on the upper floor.

3.label: Routine Reminder
3.desc: In the depot safe. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.1] or a satchel charge.

4.label: Communication Operations
4.desc: On a wooden crate on the observation tower.

5.label: Additional Flak Positions
5.desc: On a desk on the ground floor.

1.label: Führermuseum Concept Model
1.desc: On a covered piece of furniture on the ground floor.

2.label: Practice Pose Photography
2.desc: In a safe in Hitler's private chambers. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.2] or a satchel charge.

3.label: Possible Hitler Disguises
3.desc: On a table in the round room with a fireplace.

1.label: Stone Eagle
1.desc: Above the main entrance to Hitler's residence.

2.label: Stone Eagle
2.desc: On a hill above the tunnel entrance.

3.label: Stone Eagle
3.desc: On the roof of a house on the other side of the lake.

1.label: Rifle Workbench
1.desc: In the basement of the building.

2.label: SMG Workbench
2.desc: In the basement of the building.

1.label: Assassinate the Führer
1.desc.2: Poison Hitler's breakfast with the @link[special.2.1] from the kitchen.
1.desc.3: Place a rat bomb in the main hall.
1.desc.4: Cut short Hitler's reading session in the library.
1.desc.6: Kill Hitler in his basement and spoil his fun at the bowling alley.
1.desc.8: Ruin Hitler's Dinner with Drexler in the dining hall.
1.desc.9: Give sweet dreams to Hitler in his private chambers.

1.label: Neutralize Radio Communications
1.desc.2: Option B - Disable the radio equipment (0/2).

2.label: 2 - Inside the Teahouse
2.desc: Hitler eats his breakfast inside the Teahouse. Poison can be found in the Teahouse kitchen.

3.label: 3 - Main Hall
3.desc: Rats have been spotted in the main hall.

4.label: 4 - Library
4.desc: Hitler spends time in the library each day.

5.label: 5 - Hitler's Study
5.desc: Hitler does paperwork in his study.

6.label: 6 - The Basement
6.desc: Hitler has a personal bowling alley in the basement. Hitler often visits the basement bar after bowling. Hitler has a parcel to collect in the mail room.

7.label: 7 - The Lake
7.desc: Hitler prefers to be alone at the lake.

8.label: 8 - Dining Hall
8.desc: Hitler will be meeting with Drexler in the dining hall.

9.label: 9 - Hitler's Quarters
9.desc: Hitler ends his day alone in front of the fireplace. Hitler has a personal safe in his quarters.

10.label: Depot
10.desc: Hitler's schedule is kept inside a safe in the depot.

11.label: Lakeside Path
11.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

1.label: Building Door 1
1.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.1] or a satchel charge.

2.label: Building Door 2
2.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.2] or a satchel charge.

3.label: Armory Door
3.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.3] or a satchel charge.

1.label: Poison
1.desc.1: On a shelf in the kitchen.
1.desc.2: On a table in the kitchen.

2.label: Phonograph
2.desc: Can be turned on to play music and mask sounds.
